text: Capital Punishment is the first studio album by American rapper, Big Punisher. It was released on April 28, 1998 through Loud Records and Terror Squad Entertainment. The album received critical acclaim, peaking at #1 on the Top R&B; Albums and #2 on the Billboard 200 charts. == Songs == 1\. "Intro" 0:33 2\. "Beware" Christopher Rios Jerry Tineo JuJu 3:15 3\.
